testcase.name: isNetworkAvailable returns false when network has no internet capability
isNetworkAvailable returns true when network is available with internet
isNetworkAvailable returns false when no active network
observeConnectivity emits initial network state

testcase.name: isNetworkAvailable returns false when network is not validated
